#!/bin/bash

# Set the directory path
DIRECTORY="$HOME/Documents/superwhisper/recordings"

# Count the number of folders (directories) in the specified path
FOLDER_COUNT=$(find "$DIRECTORY" -type d | wc -l)

# Subtract 1 from the count to exclude the root directory itself
FOLDER_COUNT=$((FOLDER_COUNT - 1))

# Echo the total number of folders
echo "$FOLDER_COUNT"

#!/bin/bash

# Set the base directory (use full path)
BASE_DIR="$HOME/Documents/superwhisper/recordings"

# Safely convert KMVAR_localKeep to an integer and subtract 1
KEEP_COUNT=$(echo "$KMVAR_localKeep" | grep -E '^[0-9]+$' || echo 5)
KEEP_COUNT=$((KEEP_COUNT + 1))

# Ensure KEEP_COUNT is a positive number
KEEP_COUNT=$((KEEP_COUNT > 0 ? KEEP_COUNT : 5))

# Validate base directory exists
if [[ ! -d "$BASE_DIR" ]]; then
    echo "Error: Base directory does not exist"
    exit 1
fi

# List subdirectories, sorting from oldest to newest
FOLDERS=$(find "$BASE_DIR" -maxdepth 1 -type d \
    ! -name '.' \
    ! -name '..*' \
    -print0 | xargs -0 stat -f "%m %N" | sort -n | cut -d' ' -f2- | sed "s|^$BASE_DIR/||")

# Convert FOLDERS to an array
IFS=$'\n' read -d '' -r -a FOLDER_ARRAY <<< "$FOLDERS"

# Calculate the number of folders to delete
TOTAL_FOLDERS=${#FOLDER_ARRAY[@]}
FOLDERS_TO_DELETE=$((TOTAL_FOLDERS > KEEP_COUNT ? TOTAL_FOLDERS - KEEP_COUNT : 0))

# Prepare an array to hold full paths of folders to delete
PATHS_TO_DELETE=()

# Collect paths of folders to delete (now from oldest first)
for ((i=0; i<FOLDERS_TO_DELETE; i++)); do
    folder="${FOLDER_ARRAY[i]}"
    full_path="$BASE_DIR/$folder"
    
    # Extremely careful checks
    if [[ -d "$full_path" ]] && 
       [[ "$full_path" != "$BASE_DIR" ]] && 
       [[ "$folder" != "" ]] && 
       [[ "$folder" != "." ]] && 
       [[ "$folder" != ".." ]]; then
        PATHS_TO_DELETE+=("$full_path")
    fi
done

# Delete folders if there are any to remove
if [[ ${#PATHS_TO_DELETE[@]} -gt 0 ]]; then
    # Use rm to directly delete the folders
    rm -rf "${PATHS_TO_DELETE[@]}"
    
    # Print the number of folders deleted
    echo "Deleted ${#PATHS_TO_DELETE[@]} folders"
fi
